responses.rationale: Describes development capability ('vaccines are being developed') and future possibility ('might help in the future') without active reassurance.
Describes a safeguard/measure ('Properly cooking poultry and eggs... will also kill any viruses') without active reassurance.
Describes applying lessons learned ('industry and government apply the lessons learned') which is a preparedness/response measure, without active reassurance.
Describes a response measure ('going to compensate farmers') without active reassurance.

Describes implemented safeguards/measures ('upgraded barn ventilation and installed laser systems') without active reassurance.
